name: Franco, James Christian
remarks: Consistently exceeds expectations. Excellent problem-solving and leadership skills.

name: Reyes, Maria Clara
remarks: Outstanding people management and conflict resolution. Great team player.

name: Santos, John Paulo
remarks: Strong analytical skills. Meets deadlines consistently. Room to grow in communication.

name: Garcia, Anna Marie

name: Dela Cruz, Lisa Ann
remarks: Exceptional leadership. Streamlined operations resulting in 20% cost reduction.
